ca.mcgill.ecse211.settings

Class SearchRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.settings.SearchRegion

  • public class SearchRegion
extends java.lang.Object
    All info related to the search zone of the game board. Received from the server through wifi.
    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 2

        1.0

      • setRedSearchLowerLeftCorner

        public static void setRedSearchLowerLeftCorner(int x,
                                               int y)
        Mutator for the coordinates of the red search zone's lower left corner. Only used by the wifi class.
        Parameters:
        x - Integer value for the X coordinate.
        y - Integer value for the Y coordinate.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMySearchLowerLeftCorner

        public static int[] getMySearchLowerLeftCorner()
        Getter for our team's lower left search corner. The one we want to search in.
        Returns:
        Either the green search zone lower left corner or the red search zone lower left corner depending on the team's color.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMySearchUpperRightCorner

        public static int[] getMySearchUpperRightCorner()
        Getter for our team's upper right search corner. The one we want to search in.
        Returns:
        Either the green search zone upper right corner or the red search zone upper right corner depending on the team's color.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getOpponentSearchLowerLeftCorner

        public static int[] getOpponentSearchLowerLeftCorner()
        Getter for the opposing team's lower left search corner. Our zone so it does not matter.
        Returns:
        Either the green search zone lower left corner or the red search zone lower left corner depending on the team's color.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getOpponentSearchUpperRightCorner

        public static int[] getOpponentSearchUpperRightCorner()
        Getter for the opposing team's upper right search corner. Our zone so it does not matter.
        Returns:
        Either the green search zone upper right corner or the red search zone upper right corner depending on the team's color.
        Since:
        1.0
